channel.title: Lycan's Throat Shredder
channel.description: I haven't made a model in over 4 years soo.. It may be terrible or may not.. I need opinions on what to change to make it look better and more rsps 317 material. I was thinking of adding a chain around the hilt and hanging off the bottom. [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2nqvc7l.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2vtquzr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/141mkhv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/15gs6t0.png[/img] [URL=http://s1197.photobucket.com/user/austinl28/media/picture035.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/picture035.jpg[/img][/URL] Edited the Color Scheme

item.title: Lycan's Throat Shredder
item.dc:creator: @Mystical_Wizard Mystical_Wizard
item.description:
@Mystical_Wizard wrote:

Sooo… No chains? Should I start working on my other one after recoloring this one?

Read full topic

item.title: Lycan's Throat Shredder
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Mystical_Wizard:

Thanks Well it only took me 10 minutes to design so I guess I can take another 5 minutes to change up the color and handle. Do y’all think a chain would look good wrapped around the hand? I was thinking of changing the rs317 player model into the werewolf model and making a server based off of Lycan Mythology… Liiikkee a quest to slay a vampire queen… Or something like that lol…

I personally don’t like the look of chains. But maybe.

Read full topic
